comment: Great teacher. He just grades too harshly, no partial credit on anything. He does sometimes give bonus points on Fridays so make sure you go. All the homework is the only way I passed the class, so make sure you do it! The final is very difficult so study hard and always make a cheat sheet for tests.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: A nice guy, but he does not care about you and will not talk to you unless it is about a specific homework problem. Do the homework or you will not pass. He does allow a cheatsheet for ALL exams.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Lectures are powerpoint based and he gives up to 10 bonus points for just attending class. But he is the pissiest man you will ever meet. He's rude and likes to criticize students when they ask questions. The final (worth 30% of entire grade) was the hardest test I've ever taken and brought my grade down. I would avoid taking Charles at all costs.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Hardest final ever. Rude and unhelpful
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Pros: Give 10 points extra credit just for showing up to class so go to all of them, you can literally bring a whole cheat sheet to every test and the final so no reason to do bad if you prepare Cons: Rude, gives sarcastic responses to your questions, Tough grader and lots of homework.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: Gives out good bonus points, so show up to class to get them! Tough grader and def makes you work for it. Do not recommend taking him unless you absolutely have to. Attendance is kinda mandatory.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: His class is hard. It takes a ton of work and a heavy homework load, but there is ONE saving grace for him- He will occasionally give you five bonus points just for being in class and not having your phone out- I have gotten 10 points from this- a free letter grade!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: I dont think hes a horrible professor until it comes time to take the test. The problems in class are so much easier than the test problems, then on top of that, no partial credit for anything. Even if your good at math, you have to be unbelievably careful since its all or nothing. He always responses to emails (weekends to), which is nice.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: I want to die every day in this class
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: The most pathetic excuse for a professor Ive ever seen. He is THE WORST teacher I have EVER had. Dont take him unless you want sarcastic responses to all your questions because this guy thinks hes better than everyone for some reason. Absolutely pathetic. I wouldnt take this guys class again for 100 dollars and a passing grade. Terrible.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: He is AWFUL. Avoid having him as a professor at all costs. He is very inconsiderate of this students and constantly talks about things that have nothing to do with algebra when he could ATTEMPT to actually teach. He will show you very simple problems in class then give you problems you never thought were possible on the test. AWFUL TEACHER OVERALL
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY

comment: Terrible. Dry. Rude. If you tune him out and are good at math, you may be ok. Randomly, he would pass out a sheet and next to your name you write 3 for 3 points added to your grade. That was the only good thing about him.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Tests are tough

comment: Pros: Gives out lots of extra credit just by showing up to class. The extra credit applies to your overall grade. Also makes funny comments and lectures are straightforward. Allows "cheat sheets'' to be used for test & final Cons: Lots of homework (ie: per section finished), tests are hw problems, no partial credit, no phone usage,
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: AWFUL professor. He is rude, and overall a horrible professor. He teaches you MATH off of a powerpoint. Final exam is impossible, dropped me from an A to a C. DO NOT TAKE DROP AT ALL COSTS!!!!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY--Tests are tough

comment: He is so rude and his class is very difficult considering what you practice on the homework is not what is on the test. I went to the SMART center and they even had problems with answering his questions. DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY

comment: Why are you even considering taking this professor's class? Click that back button and look at anyone else
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--TEST HEAVY--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: Lots and lots of work and homework that rarely helps with the upcoming tests that will come along. Do not ever expect to leave his class and believe you will not have work to do. And for your feelings avoid asking questions because he will say anything to make it look like you just asked the stupidest question in the world.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Can't hear him, but I could make out that he has a lisp. Almost all the grades in the class are homework. The final is impossible. Avoid this fat midget dude who waddles when he walks.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: GO TO CLASS AND YOU GET EXTRA CREDIT. I showed up to the final exam (60% of your grade) with a 117... THAT IS NOT A TYPO. Mean person, but it's not hard. test are online/ open book. Final is in-class. If you go to class, theres no reason you should not get an A.
Trash
rating_tags: Tough Grader--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: So much homework that didn't have anything to do with the lesson. Tests are only 12 questions! Bad teacher avoid at all cost.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--GRADED BY FEW THINGS

comment: He was the worst Professor I have ever had. The homework has nothing to do with the tests he gives you. He makes rude comments and if you ask a question in class he will answer sarcastically and make you seem like an idiot for not knowing the answer. He goes through the lecture really quickly so it's hard to follow. His notes do not help. I would recommend going to the SMART center for extra help. Please do not sign up for his class.
rating_tags: LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Worst professor I've ever had. SO much homework, and he is not a pleasant person in general. His comments during class were rude and unnecessary, and when you ask a question in class, he answers the question sarcastically, if at all. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: Prof. Mooney is a good teacher but he is very sarcastic and whispers very non funny jokes. He will call people out with no problem if you aren't doing what he wants you to. He sometimes lectures quickly
rating_tags: TEST HEAVY

comment: Charles is a very friendly teacher who is good at personal instruction. While his math teaching may be sub-par, he is very inspirational in other areas of life coaching. I feel like he has really taught me so much...
rating_tags: Respected--Inspirational--Caring

comment: DO NOT TAKE HIM. I ended up withdrawing from this class because I just couldn't take it anymore. He's so rude and condescending. Homework is posted EVERY NIGHT, and usually has nothing to do with what you will be tested on.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: This is an easy a class as long as you are able to use a calculator, but if you are bad at math this is not the professor you want. He is extremely rude first off, he assigns a bunch of homework that rarely pertains to the test and he will call you stupid if you ask a question. He does not reason with logic. I have an A but don't take this guy.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK

comment: He is sarcastic and not helpful at all. If you ask a questions about the powerpoint or homework he will make you feel stupid. Part A of homework is always easy but once you get to Part B expect nothing higher than a D. His power points do not help at all so going to class is pointless you are better off getting help from the SMART center.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: AVOID. RUN. DO NOT TAKE. It's not worth the bad grade. He is awful. Posts all powerpoint online, and literally just reads them in class. No elaborating. Will not help you when you have a question, does everything to make you feel stupid (he actually called my class stupid on the first day). The homework is easy but the tests are EXTREMELY harder.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.

comment: Do not take this class. He is very rude and sarcastic. Power points are long and boring but gives multiple examples and its a lot of notes. You will spend hours on homework but only helps your grade. The test are only and he takes off a lot of points because of typos. The final is extremely hard and will drop your grade.  I went from an A to a C.

He is very helpful in the way that he gives many examples and explains things very thoroughly. Attendance is not required but it's a good idea to go. All tests are online (except the final) and expect 2 assignments and a quiz after each class on My Math Lab. The final weighs alot. I maintained a B all semester, failed the final and got a D average.
he is a sacarsticly insulting professor and his work is hard for no reason and he moves to fast and he doesnt give any partial credit.

Tons of homework each night, in class quizzes for each chapter that you will fail, does not care if you get the lesson or not he continues to move on. Very fast pace and will not answer your questions.

Ridiculous amount of homework and quizzes. Like hours of homework nightly. If you ask an honest question in class, he makes you feel stupid with his sarcastic answers. He makes the tests terribly hard for how easy of a class this should be. Final exam was impossible, made my grade go from an A to a C. Would not recommend anyone to take this guy.

Going into the final I had a 120. That should say enough. He gives bonus points just for going to class, and the homework and quizzes only HELP you. If you work hard on assignments and pay attention in class, its an easy A. He does not take attendance. Give no effort, your A could easily drop to a C by the end of the course. Class is very boring.

When I first signed up for this class, I was worried about being able to pass based on the previous reviews. Currently, I have a month left and it's one of my easiest classes. All he wants is you to pay attention in class and do your homework, it's really not that bad. Keep up with homework and pass the tests and you can get an A. Stay off phones.

DO NOT TEXT IN CLASS. he gives points if you don't towards the end of the year. You have a quiz and roughly 40 problems of homework after every class which does help your grade ( or ruin it like me ). he does put all the notes online everyday and everything but your final is online. he will call you out if you do something wrong in class.

He's not as bad as what people make him out to be. Yes a ton of homework but it only HELPS your grade. sometimes homework doesn't match up with notes bc it can be tough but its doable. test are way easier than homework. gives bonus points for going to class. DO NOT TEXT IN CLASS. as of right now i have a 100 even though I've failed some quizzes.

I took him my first semester here. I always made A's in any math class I've ever taken. I asked him for help and he turned me away acting like I was stupid. Tests are the hardest things I've ever taken. Honestly he should be fired.

I had an A all semester even though I stink at math. We had homework between almost every class period. Some of it took 30 minutes, some days it would take hours to finish. He gives a lot of notes, and all the work is online. However, the final was impossible. Most people I know got below a 50. It dropped my grade to a C, despite an A all semester.

Professor Mooney gives math work every week on MyMathLab but it's necessary that you do it and do well on it. It helps your grade alot if you do bad on the tests. Plus it prepares you for the tests. The tests are hard and the final is nearly impossible to pass. I would only recommend if you want a challenge and are good in math.

Do not take him. I repeat do not take him. What you do in class may be easy but when it comes to the homeworktests you will be lost because he makes them hard on purpose. And let's just say the whole class walked out of the final knowing they failed because he made it that hard. Find another professor because he's awful

Worst Professor I have ever had. He was rude and often yelled at and insulted students. He is as tough as he can be on grading and the final was 90% compromised of the material from the last exam, so if you didnt do well on the last exam you will fail the final as well. Homework every night. DO NOT TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!!

The only good thing about his class is that most of the tests and homework are online so, you can use your notes and get help. Make sure to look at syllabus. He is very strict about attendance, make up work, cell phone, and other things. I do not recommend taking him because he is very sarcastic and it's hard to get help out of him.

I'm a very good math student. Always was in accelerated math programs in high school. Most of this course I already learned in 10th grade. AVOID THIS TEACHER. The material isn't that tough. Homework after every class. Even being a good math student, I found myself spending 2-4 hours on homework (always graded for accuracy). Homework is tough. AVOID

DO NOT TAKE HIM Horrible class. Mooney makes the class so difficult to the point where it takes half an hour to understand the material. He is  terrible as a teacher, he makes you feel miserable if you dare ask questions about something you don't get, he can be so mean to the point where made a girl cry. DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS YOU WILL REGRET IT!

Although I got an A in this class it is not a class that I would take again. Charles is rude and the class was difficult. I went to the math lab for help with every single homework! Avoid him if you can, study REALLY hard if you cant.

He is he worst professor I have ever had. Im terrible at math just a much as the next person, and when you go to ask questions, he will make you feel dumb for even asking it in the first place. He's super sarcastic and thinks he's hilarious. His final is impossible!

This class really threw me for a loop. Prof. Mooney is very smart, there's no denying that, but unless you have a solid foundation of math going into this course or you pick up on mathematical concepts very easily, reconsider this professor. Surprise quizzes, take-home tests (unless he notices the class using a calc.), & notes through Powerpoint.

Awful teacher Don't Take him. He will yell at you and make fun of you in front of the whole class. He acts like he's so much better then his students. Very hard tests and quizzes. If you ask a question then he will make fun of you in front of the whole class. I guess it never crossed his mind that the reason students don't know things is b/c of him

Great professor! He can be frustrating but his teaching methods make learning Trig very easy!! You don't really need the book because all assignments are based on the notes. Doesn't use MML. Attendance is mandatory but you WANT to be there to take notes because he won't post them. Allowed an elaborate cheat sheet for the final. Overall, loved him!

Here's the deal. If you are the avg college student/immature teen, expect to fail. You must read directions, pay attention, not ask stupid questions, work very very hard, do all the suggested homework, and you can get an A. Hardcore teacher, definitely not easy, but will teach you the "why" and "how" things work. Read every word of the syllabus

Do not take this professor, not even if you are good at math!!! This professor is not helpful, makes test super hard and not anything like the homework. Goes on rants during class time. Does not give partial credit on anything! The final is so bad and can drop you two letter grades. All he cares about is himself. Don't take his class!!!

This is my first review on here and I did it to warn all students to STAY AWAY FROM HIM AT ALL COSTS. Mooney is rude and unhelpful. His tests are extremely inconsistent with the HW, and he makes no reach to help you. I was an all A and B student until him. I made a D, retook the course with a someone else and got an A because the teacher was better

This man is not the kindest teacher at KSU. In the many years I've been a student, I've had better. I have failed his class, yes mostly my fault but he didn't help at all. He is a perfectionist and will call you out personally. Do not take him, there is a great chance you will fail. I hope you heed this warning

This proffessor and i use the term loosly is terriable.He is more concerned about his stupid typing quiz then letting you take online test. I had to take a zero on a test because of a stupid space and comma. DO NOT EVER TAKE him. HE says he was an engineer but all he was was a time effeciency person. not a true engineer

Professor mooney is not as bad as everyone makes him seem. As long as you come to class you will do fine. His test are online so you can use your notes for them.  HW is graded for accuracy and he gives you bonus boints everynow and then if you are in class. Attendance is mandatory and he does drop lowest test grade and 2 lowest HW grades.
Good teacher, lots of extra points and oother things to do to improve a grade. i liked him and i enjoyed his sarcasm

An incredibly smart and intelligent teacher. I can understand how some people may not get his sharp personality as he is a little old school. But as for Math, some people giving reviews need to put on big boy pants and buckle down and study. You cannot cruise thru this course and be given an A, you have to do the work. hard work = good grade.

STAY AWAY! if you care about your grade, do not take his class. he teaches easy stuff in class, then gives you ridiculous online tests. if you enter it wrong, the whole problem is wrong. i don't know of anyone that passed the final. it dropped my grade from a B to a D. AVOID!

DO NOT. I repeat, DO NOT take Math 1111 with this man! The final was ridiculous, some of the people I talked to made 18's and 24's! These people had a decent grade in the class too! My grade dropped 14 with the final. I should have listened to these other reviews and dropped the class when I had the chance! So much for my 3.0, thank you Charles!!

Mooney is hard-core. If you need your hand held, find another teacher. Mooney is not a very likeable person, but I found him to be a very good teacher of the subject matter. He was very direct with what he expected, gave tons of examples, offered class notes that you could bring to class and add to during lecture. Tests are extremely difficult.

RUN FAR AWAY !!!! Attempted to take Math in Summer with this Prof. He has obviously had bad experiences with students breaking his rules in the past, and he used valuable class time talking about it.  Yet if YOU have a question in class, he speaks down to you as if YOUR the one disrupting class, I pd.$650  to listen to him gripe, what a waste!!!!!

Mr. Mooney is an ok person. But, he goes through the material very fast. He is not one to help his students. I had emailed him a couple of times regarding different problems and he would just tell me to reread the directions(I'm putting his response very nicely. If you are good in math you might do ok. But, I would suggest trying someone else.

HORRIBLE! I have always been VERY good at math, he almost failed me , making the tests nearly impossible, rude to all students. Very spiteful, and enjoys watching student fail. After finishing with the worst grade I have ever recieved in a class, that I should have gotten an A in. I moved on to get an A in both of my calculus classes,with great pro

LOVED IT! His printable notes were clear and thorough. His tests were exactly like he said they would be - same types of problems as on homework and in his notes. TO MAKE AN A: go to class, follow along with his notes, do the homework, prepare a cheat sheet for the test (as is allowed), go to the math lab if needed.

I loathe this man. He is disrespectful to students when they ask questions and does not care at all about helping them, even if they are willing to work. He goes on long rants about the superiority of people in the military, but never mentioned serving in the military. I received a "D", but, to be fair, I did not seek tutoring. AVOID!

Horrible teacher. He did not explain any concept. If you want to pass Math 1111, do not take this class. I already failed it once. Do your self a favor, DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! I promise you, you will regret taking this class. Im trying to help other students with passing on this vital info. See Mooney? AVOID it because hes not a teacher. I knows h

Don't take him, if not for his terrible teaching then for his poor attitude and condescending nature towards students. He won't help you, he'll treat you like he's far superior to anything you know and he'll take off meaningless points on homework which are a huge part of your grade.

Asolute worst teacher...in the world! He's arrogant but ignorant at the same time. He stopped collecting homework (which was 1/3 of the overall avg) halfway through the semester and does not give partial credit. I am very passionate about how much i despise this man and his teaching abilities. DO NOT TAKE HIM!!!

Make sure you do all of your homework (go to the math lab to check your solutions) it is a big part of your grade.He goes through the notes way too quickly and is VERY condescending. If someone asks him a question he acts annoyed and acts as if they should already know the answer.If you can avoid taking him I definitely would.
I hada 98 going into the final and made a B in the class because the final was nothing at all like the other work we'd done. This class made me loose my 4.0, don't take him if only for the final.

He goes through his lectures very fast, but he makes his notes available online. Homework is an essential part of your grade in this class. While his tests are difficult, he allows the use of a cheat sheet. I wouldn't recommend this professor if you don't already have a decent working knowledge of algebra.

Moves very quickly and doesn't like to stop for clarification. Teaches math like he's reminding you of what you already know instead of teaching like it's new information. Tests do not resemble homework or lecture examples. I only took him b/c all other math classes were full. Dropped to save my 4.0. Avoid at all cost.

I'll be honest math is not my greatest subject. Personally, I do much better with a teacher who is willing to do their job and actually wants to be there. Most days consisted of random, cynical lectures about the entire world. I truly regret taking this class and have very little respect for the man.

Please do NOT take this class. The tests are super hard and are NOTHING like the notes or what he tells you to study. He talks WAY too fast. He condescendingly talks down to students. Every time I went to his office hours for help, he was RUDE. The homework is even super hard! Only a masochist would take his class!

When I took him, he gave very detailed lectures. The tests somewhat strayed from the lecture material, but not any worse than most other college profs. Warm and fuzzy? No. Overly helpful? No. Arrogant? Yes. A jerk? Yes...So what. He's there to teach, not be a role model. I know one thing...the dude knows his stuff.

If you show up to class and do the homework it's almost impossible to fail.  I got a 56 on my first exam in there and still had an 83 in the class overall.  He gives bonuses just for being in class.  He even allows cheat sheets on the tests.  The only way you could fail is if you didn't do the work and didn't come to class.
teacher sucks. makes simple math impossible

The teacher's test are extremely hard. He gave us little encouragement on the test and stated "I already know I'm going to wipe half of you all out of my class with this first test." MOST of the homework assigned, does not prepare you for his test.  You have a chance to score over a 100 on his test, but will be lucky to get a 60. AVOID if possible.
doesnt give partial credit and the test nothing like the notes, but gives free attendance points.

The people who are criticizing this teacher are likely the ones who make him act the way he does. I agree, he does seem to make snide comments at times, but if you overlook his rants and focus on his structured and very clear notes, you will make an A for sure. He even posts his notes online, something that many professors dismiss. Sure the tests a

Worst teacher ever. The tests he gives are nothing like the homework he assigns. He counts off for stupid mistakes like forgetting to skip lines between problems  and he marks the entire problem wrong because of it. DO NOT TAKE HIM! You will be miserable and you probably will fail

He is not a bad prof. AT ALL! He's not all warm and fuzzy but if you pay attention and do the work you will get a good grade. Don't use your phone, laptop or do other stupid stuff in class and he won't bother you. He types up his notes for you which is very helpful and has been polite when answering questions in class. He just doesn't like slakers.

I am currently in this guy's class and he is TERRIBLE! He won't allow note taking, he uses notes online, and never leaves his seat. He makes dumb comments all day and seems to think everyone is stupid. I think the few nice comments on here were probably written by him! I have no idea why he is still employed and think he gives KSU a bad name!

This teacher is by far the worst, most arrogant, and most condescending teacher I have ever met. He should not even be teaching!He takes pride in making tests difficult just to make himself seem smarter than everyone else! Total jerk!

terrible professor. he's sarcastic and rude. He doesn't take his job seriously and could care less about his students. I have never in my 13 years of school made less than an A in a math class but in his, i made a D. Because of him, I lost HOPE scholarship. To sum up, he's a jerk and a worthless professor. I am surprised he isn't fired yet.

WOST TEACHER EVER!!!! I had always been very good in math but when it came to this teacher, I had to drop the class to keep from failing! He is very smart and knows his math but feels the need to make simple math complicated just bc he can. Treats you like you are the dumbest person on earth if you act a question! DO NOT TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!!
this guy is worthless im a math major and even i no he shouldnt teach the way he does. DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT TAKE THIS GUY.
worst teacher ever!! he doesn't know how to teach a class. he is just worried about spaces and commas than your final correct answer.

Worst teacher I've ever taken. I'm in Calc 2 with a B yet I will just scrape by with a C in this class if I'm lucky. He grades more on spacing than actual math and everything but the final is online. He thinks he is hilarious and only used the board because his computer broke. Stay away at all cost. He needs to be reported. Waste of time and money.

I agree with all these ratings except for the good ones. He is a horrible teacher. Everything's online. If you miss an answer by a point he counts it wrong. He averaged my hw avg without grading one of them. I'm scared about the final.He talks about himself more then he teaches. When he teaches he doesn't elaborate and is too fast. Don't take him!
Worst class i've ever taken. I took algebra when I was in 8th grade and did wonderfully, this class was AWFUL! Everything was online, I don't even know what this man's handwriting looks like!

He is the worst teacher ever. He thinks he is better than everyone. He does not allow students to really be able to ask question without being a smart butt back and act like they are stupid. He has all his work online and does not let you have chance to fix stuff if the internet goes out. DO NOT TAKE THIS MAN!

The class overall was pretty easy.  He gives good notes and explains things well overall.  The final on the other hand was extremely difficult and nothing like the semester tests.  I had a 96 going into the final and made an 81 in the class.

Took his class this semester. I wasn't surprised to read all the negative feedback about him. I agree, that he can be blunt with his comments and cheesy with his jokes, but that's not what counts. The main focus should be on learning. I think he is very knowledgeable in math, and all the instructions and examples were clear.

Not good at all.  He is boring, dull, and seems more interested in making students feel like idiots rather than actually teaching them.  If it's counted wrong, and you think you're right, don't bother explaining, it's gonna stay "wrong."  All assignments are online. Don't bother buying the book, it will collect dust on your shelf.

This is the worst class I have ever taken!The material is really easy but he grades really weird and everything is online. Even if u have the problem right he will find a way for it to be wrong.u can sleep or listen to his lectures, dont do anything else bc he will fail u. if u take this class be prepared to be treated like a middle schooler.

Overall, it's a pretty easy class. All the homework, tests, and notes are online, which should make an easy A. Just make sure read the instructions clearly on questions-he leaves condescending notes that would make anyone bummed out. Also, if you plan on taking his class, don't buy the book, we never use it.

This class was extremely easy.  He gives crystal clear notes and puts them online also.  All assignments are online therefore you can use many resources because you do not have to show work.  He is a little condescending but overall he is a great teacher.  The people who think he is terrible must have not done their work at all.

the class was easy, but don't waste your money on the book. he's a horrible teacher and is obnoxious in class. if you miss more than 7 days you get a letter grade deducted from your final grade. wouldnt recommend him if you dont already know the material.

HE IS TERRIBLE! Do not take his class. Everything is online except the final and when I asked him about some math problems he pulled me up in front of the class, made fun of me and called me an idiot. Seriously, dont take him even if he's your only option
i have always been good at math and im struggling so hard in his class because he sucks. dont take him!!

Attendance is Mandatory! He writes notes on the board and often makes such cheesy jokes and treats everyone like they are kids. It wasn't an easy class, but if you study the notes, you will do fine on the homework and tests (both online). Overall, if you pay attention and do your homework, you will pass the class.

Dont take this class... seriously. He makes no sense and the math assignments and tests are ONLINE. Imagine a math class online. He grades more for if you got correct spaces when you were typing rather than if you understood the concept. Dont waste your time with this teacher!

This professor is very condescending and downright RUDE! I asked for clarification on something and he said in front of the whole class, "You didn't get that last time?".  I said "OBVIOUSLY not".  Definitely unhelpful and has major chip-on-his shoulder ISSUES!

Mooney shouldn't be teaching college students.  He treats them like junior high kids.  He moves too quickly on the board. Homework is on MathXL which helps you get through the HW, but the tests are way different than the homework.  I got A's in all my other classes by barely squeaked by with a D. His class was a huge waste of time. Avoid his class.
Horrible!!! :(
DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS!!!!!! he is a very hard teacher and attendence is absolutely mandatory. tests are super hard.
Talks way too fast and writes notes way too fast. Funny but too much of a smart alec. Tests are hard.

I don't like his style.  He talks bad about his students. He writes everything on the board, but the tests are so different than the homework, it's hard to keep up.  He moves too quickly on the board.  He never asks if there are questions from the test or homework. I wouldn't recommend him at all.

He is one of my favorite teachers! He is very easy to understand, and makes comments that are really funny! He makes it easy to understand things but personally, I'm not a fan of him in general. He is a bit rude and can be offencive at times. But besides that, it is a very informative class and the homework is easy. Pretty much everything is done online.

VERY EASY! Writes all of the notes you need to take on the board and shows examples for everything. Not boring at all...he's very witty.  All homework is online, but you make a 100 on every homework assignment. He gives you plenty of time to do your homework. Tests are online also.
